name: ai-repo-adventures
description: An AI-powered adventure generator used to explore and learn about repositories.

scripts.test: npm run build && npx tsx tests/comprehensive-test-runner.ts
scripts.test:unit: npm run build && npx tsx tests/unit-test-runner.ts
scripts.test:integration: npm run build && npx tsx tests/integration-test-runner.ts
scripts.test:simple: npm run build && npx tsx tests/simple-test.ts
scripts.test:real-world: npm run build && npx tsx tests/real-world-test.ts
scripts.test:html: npm run build && node packages/generator/bin/cli.js --theme space --output tests/public --overwrite --max-quests 1 --log-llm-output --serve
scripts.test:html:full: npm run build && node packages/generator/bin/cli.js --theme mythical --output tests/public --overwrite
scripts.test:llm: npm run build && npx tsx tests/integration/llm-integration.test.ts
scripts.test:all: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
scripts.test:prompts: npm run build && npx tsx tests/prompt-output-test.ts
scripts.chat: npm run build && npx tsx tests/interactive-test.ts
scripts.publish:all: npm run build && npm run publish:generator && npm run publish:mcp
